data.text: Oluwaseyi Adetola holds a Higher National Diploma (HND) in Accountancy from Akwa-Ibom State Polytechnic and a Post Graduate Diploma (PGD) in Financial Management Accounting from Ladoke Akintola University of Technology (Lautech). He is an Associate of the Institute of Capital Market Registrars (ICMR) and a Student member of the Chartered Institute Bankers of Nigeria (CIBN) and also an accredited Trainer with the Centre for Management Development (CMD).
He has over 23 years Banking experience from Union Bank Plc, with in-depth knowledge in Share Registration, Human Resources Training and Banking related activities.
